body.raw:
{ "resourceType": "CodeSystem", "url": "http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/prem-paris-domain", "version": "1.0", "name": "PremParisDomain", "title": "PaRIS PREM Domains (Experience of Care)", "status": "active", "content": "complete", "caseSensitive": false, "text": { "status": "generated", "div": "

PaRIS PREM experience-of-care domains

" }, "concept": [ { "code": "access", "display": "Access", "definition": "Getting care when needed, affordability, convenience." }, { "code": "comprehensiveness", "display": "Comprehensiveness", "definition": "Breadth of services addressing a personâ€™s range of needs." }, { "code": "continuity", "display": "Continuity", "definition": "Ongoing relationships and information continuity over time." }, { "code": "coordination", "display": "Coordination", "definition": "How well services and providers work together across settings." }, { "code": "patient-safety", "display": "Patient Safety", "definition": "Perceived safety of care processes and environment." }, { "code": "person-centredness", "display": "Person-centredness", "definition": "Respect, involvement in decisions, responsiveness to preferences." }, { "code": "self-management-support", "display": "Self-management Support", "definition": "Support to manage conditions, set goals, build capability." }, { "code": "trust", "display": "Trust", "definition": "Confidence in professionals and the organisation." }, { "code": "overall-perceived-quality", "display": "Overall Perceived Quality of Care", "definition": "Global judgement of care quality." } ] }

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:8080/fhir/Patient \
  -H "Content-Type: application/fhir+json" \
  -d '{
    "resourceType":"Patient",
    "name":[{"use":"official","family":"Doe","given":["Jane"]}],
    "gender":"female",
    "birthDate":"1988-05-21",
    "identifier":[{"system":"https://example.org/mrn","value":"MRN-0001"}],
    "address":[{"city":"Zurich","country":"CH"}]
  }'

body.raw:
{ "resourceType": "CodeSystem", "url": "http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/nreq-items", "version": "1.0", "name": "NreqQuestions", "title": "Neurorehabilitation Experience Questionnaire (NREQ) Items", "status": "active", "content": "complete", "caseSensitive": false, "publisher": "University of Surrey / Surrey Community Health", "text": { "status": "generated", "div": "

NREQ item codes (Q01â€“Q17)

" }, "concept": [ { "code": "NREQ-Q01", "display": "When I arrived I was given information about the unit and what would happen during my stay" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q02", "display": "The facilities on the unit were good (e.g., washing facilities, toilets)" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q03", "display": "There was somewhere secure to keep my belongings" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q04", "display": "I was able to discuss personal matters in private" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q05", "display": "There were enough things to do in my free time (e.g., watch TV, join a group)" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q06", "display": "There was a friendly atmosphere on the unit" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q07", "display": "I felt the staff really cared about me" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q08", "display": "The staff worked well as a team" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q09", "display": "I felt able to talk to the staff about any problems I had" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q10", "display": "I was asked what I wanted to achieve during my stay" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q11", "display": "I felt as though the staff and I were partners in the whole process of care" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q12", "display": "The staff kept me informed every step of the way" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q13", "display": "My family or carer was involved in discussions about my treatment if I wanted them to be" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q14", "display": "I am happy with the amount of therapy or treatment I received for..." }, { "code": "NREQ-Q15", "display": "I received enough emotional support" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q16", "display": "I am feeling well supported and prepared for my discharge" }, { "code": "NREQ-Q17", "display": "I am satisfied with the progress I have made during my stay" } ] }

Generated from cURL: curl -sS 'http://localhost:8080/fhir/QuestionnaireResponse?_count=20&_sort=-_lastUpdated' \
  -H 'Accept: application/fhir+json' | jq '.total, .entry[]?.resource.id'
